title: ArtifactCreationProgressData
description: Schema for the data part of an artifact creation progress signal.

type.description: The constant type for this data part.

filename.description: The name of the artifact being created.

description.description: An optional description of the artifact being created.

status.description: The status of the artifact creation.

bytes_transferred.description: The number of bytes transferred so far.

artifact_chunk.description: The chunk of artifact data that was transferred in this progress update. Only present for 'in-progress' status.

mime_type.description: The MIME type of the artifact. Only present for 'completed' status.

version.description: The version number of the artifact being created or updated.
